text: Maria! I'm so glad we ran into each other.

Hello, I'm Maria. And you are Alex, right? *smiling* Nice to see you again. I hope you're doing well. *looking around the cafe* This is a lovely spot, isn't it? My friend, Rachel, recommended it to me. *taking a seat* So, how have you been?
It's been... nice place indeed! Maria, have you thought about securing your future with life insurance?

Oh! *leans forward, almost whispering* It's been...  busy, but good. How about you? You know,  *smiles knowingly*  this cafe... reminds me of... something important.

Ah, yes, busy. You know,  it's been... It's been good.  Lots going on. But how have *you* been, Maria?

Hello, Alex! *smiling* Nice to see you again. I've been doing okay, I guess. Just trying to keep up with my job and everything else. *sighs slightly* It's been a bit of a struggle lately, to be honest. But I'm managing. *pauses* So, what brings you here today?

You know, Maria, life has its ups and downs. That's why I'm here to talk about FWD's Self-for-Life insurance. A bit of security can make the tough times easier. Would you like some details on how it could help you?

Hello, Alex! *smiling* I'm actually a bit curious about this insurance thing. I've been meaning to look into it, but I haven't had the chance yet. What's this Self-for-Life plan all about? *leaning in slightly*

Ah, well, it's a whole life plan. It's designed to protect you for life and give living benefits, like coverage for critical illnesses. It's a way to secure your future, Maria.  I can explain more if you'd like.
